overview: A new experimental piece by Ovidie: two films, same actors, two different directors. In an effort to show the reality of the difference between porn made by men and women, Ovidie commissioned the same script, with the same actors in the same location, to be shot by one male and one female director. This version is shot by a man, Dist de Kaerth! The results are eye opening. And what's more, it stars the insanely popular Stoya!
title: Supermacho vs X-Girl
